observation.output:
Testing MatrixSymbol printing issue...

Expression: A - A*B - B
Expected output: A - A*B - B (or similar with proper minus signs)
Actual outputs:
str():    (-1)*B + (-1)*A*B + A
pprint(): -B + -A⋅B + A
latex():  -1 B + -1 A B + A

Issue detected: True
❌ ISSUE CONFIRMED: Negative coefficients are not properly formatted as subtraction

==================================================
Testing simpler cases:

A - B:
str():    (-1)*B + A
latex():  -1 B + A

A + B:
str():    A + B
latex():  A + B

-B:
str():    (-1)*B
latex():  -1 B
